name: Mars Dash: Battle Running Game
description:
Play the ultimate racing battle with friends, Mars Dash!

Time for a game party? Get together with your squad, and race against friends across the galaxy in Mars Dash. Collect awesome power ups like missiles, drones, jetpacks and more. Then, unleash them on your friends to finish first!

Features include:

- Play together with up to 7 friends in real-time.
- Challenge players around the world.
- Discover epic alien worlds as you race across the galaxy.
- Race on Mars, the Moon, the snowy tundra of an ice planet, and more.
- Pick and customize your favorite dashers.
- Race as an astronaut, space monkey, mars robot and many others.
- Use jetpacks, missiles, ice beams, traps and even drones to beat your friends and finish the race first by any means necessary! (Don't worry — what happens in Mars, stays in Mars.)

Mars Dash is the perfect game for your next game party with friends! With simple, one tap controls, this game is easy to pick up, and hard to put down.

Download Mars Dash now, and show your friends who's the best space explorer!
